inclusion.criterion: Term delivery between 37 -42 weeks of gestation (estimated by ultrasound)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mothers willing to return for follow up visits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Declaration of breastfeeding for at least six months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Preterm delivery < 37 weeks of gestation (estimated by ultrasound)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Need for early cord clamping (tight nuchal cord, need for resuscitation)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
